title: The Ecology of agriculture
creator_credit: Agricultural Council of Denmark and Naturfoto
brief_description: Aims to promote the use of various agricultural methods which emphasise the scientific approach. Notes the importance of nutrients in the soil: the damage caused by mildew and pests; the need for the use of sprays; the damage caused by excessive spraying; and the development of strains of pests resistant to sprays.
